name: phonebook-backend
description: In this repository, I repeat the homework from part 3 of FSO course. It is a backend for phonebook project. This is the 1st repeat practice for phonebook backend.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../phonebook-frontend && npm run build && cp -r dist ../part3-homework-phonebook-backend
scripts.build:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Jing
